introflavor.flavor: As you approach, you spot a mine. The tracks look old but somewhat functional
There is a large opening in one of the mountains. it is an old mine. there are still residues of minerals shining in the light.
Something smells like coal and iron. upon investigating the surroundings, you discover a mine that looks rich in minerals.
This place has clearly been an expedition point some time, because they left a huge quarry behind..
This looks like some sort of crater. when close up, however, you see that it is in fact a large quarry.
Upon arrival at the island, you see a large quarry in the center. this location has obviously had a lot of riches, but are there any left?
The rubbles from an airship remain on the edge of the island
You see a huge structure that looks like your castle.
An old airship seems to have crashed here long ago.
You see an old construction site nearby.
An abandoned factory appears in the distance.
You spot the ruins of an old factory.
There seems to be a collection of houses and different sort of building here, from the looks of it.
In the distance you see an old village. you are not completely sure if there are anyone still living here.
Whoever raised all these buildings sure knew what they were doing. The constructions are fascinating.
